portfolio.title: Gadish Suite application
portfolio.description: A responsive ReactJS application that showcases the Gadish Suite, a luxurious vacation rental nestled in the beautiful north of the country. It provides potential guests with all the information they need to make an informed decision and book a memorable stay.

portfolio.title: File Installation In VM
portfolio.description: The script establishes an SSH connection to the guest VM and allows the user to select a local folder containing files to be installed and executed on the VM. It copies the files to the VM, installs them if executable, executes PowerShell scripts silently, and retrieves relevant files from the VM.

portfolio.title: Dor Portfolio website
portfolio.description: Portfolio website that I developed to showcase the works of a graphic designer. Responsive, ensuring a seamless experience across various devices, including mobile phones and tablets. HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, MongoDB, ExpressJS, EJS

portfolio.title: Uzi Law Firm's website
portfolio.description: A Law Firm's website showcasing their specialization. The site emphasizes the firm's comprehensive legal services. It features an intuitive user interface for easy navigation, ensuring visitors can quickly find information about the firm's expertise and contact details.

portfolio.title: Shopping list to API
portfolio.description: A platform for managing shopping lists efficiently. Users can create, update, and store their lists in a SQL database.

portfolio.title: Booking App
portfolio.description: A barbershop booking app for easily booking appointments, showing barbershop info, and managing bookings.

portfolio.title: Food Order App
portfolio.description: A food ordering platform for jank-food and home-cooked meals.

portfolio.title: Tic Tac Toe game
portfolio.description: A tic tac toe game for two players. runs in any modern web browser.

portfolio.title: Poker Hand Evaluator
portfolio.description: A program designed to determine the winning hand in Omaha Hi/Lo poker games.

portfolio.title: Classic Snake Game
portfolio.description: A classic snake game - the player controls a snake that grows in length as it consumes food, while avoiding collisions with itself and the walls.
